---
title: NPM Scripts
sidebar_label: NPM Scripts
slug: /NpmScripts
sidebar_position: 3
---

```json
{
    "scripts": {
        //  Clean up folders generated by `compile` command
        "clean": "rimraf build",
        // Compile the TypeScript code into JavaScript code that can be run by Node.JS.
        "tsc:compile": "tsc",
        // Coly static files folder into build folder
        "copy:static": "cp -r src/static/ build/src/",
        // Compile and copy static files
        "compile": "run-s tsc:compile copy:static",
        // Run ESLint code quality check
        "lint": "eslint src/**/*.ts",
        // Fix issues reported by ESLint
        "lint:fix": "eslint src/**/*.ts --fix",
        // Start the development server by using nodemon for hot reloading
        "start": "nodemon",
        // Run tests
        "test": "jest",
        // Run tests and watch for changes
        "test:watch": "jest --watch",
        // Run tests and emit code coverage reports
        "test:cov": "jest --coverage"
    },
}
  
```
